attributes.action: To reconsider restoring our Pre covid credit score
attributes.additional_details:
The credit score is an vital part of our business, can help us to grow our business. 
 Without the possibility to borrow money from the banks we can’t continue our business after Covid pandemic period.
 I have a good feeling that if we can be successful with this petition and put it into law, this would not only help us as traders, but help our economy as well.
attributes.background:
NO Fault BAD Credit Score petition 
  I wish the Government To reconsider restoring for the Sole Traders/small Companies the credit score has been affected by Covid

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about credit scores are a matter for credit agencies, not the UK Government or Parliament.

The Information Commissioner's Office has published guidance on your rights in relation to credit data, which you can read here: https://ico.org.uk/your-data-matters/credit/
